item.title: Beneath Everything with Ronnie Rucker - Wendy Summers
item.description: this weeks show felt so super interactive. so many people mentioned us on Twitter during the recording. got a considerable amount of hits to the blog by people wanting to see wtf was going on. it was a crazy blast. so much fun. im drunk as well...i even spelled most of my tweets correctly...first time for everything. this week we had Wendy Summers on the show. we had to do two versions of the interview because it got a bit sticky. so above is the censored version and below is the #NSFW version. we played a lot fo good stuff, all pick by you the listeners. wow! another week is over...time to get back to the drawing board and whip out another for y'all. thank you all for the support & i hope you enjoy the podcast as much as i did recording it. tell a friend too Get both video interviews on our blog www.beneatheverything.com
item.dc:creator: Ronnie Rucker
item.itunes:summary:
this weeks show felt so super interactive. so many people mentioned us on Twitter during the recording. got a considerable amount of hits to the blog by people wanting to see wtf was going on. it was a crazy blast. so much fun. im drunk as well...i even spelled most of my tweets correctly...first time for everything. this week we had Wendy Summers on the show. we had to do two versions of the interview because it got a bit sticky. so above is the censored version and below is the #NSFW version. we played a lot fo good stuff, all pick by you the listeners. wow! another week is over...time to get back to the drawing board and whip out another for y'all. thank you all for the support & i hope you enjoy the podcast as much as i did recording it. tell a friend too
Get both video interviews on our blog www.beneatheverything.com

item.title: Beneath Everything with Ronnie Rucker - Automatic Toys
item.description: for the sake of this conversation, i'd like it if you would think of me as being amazing. like i could fly or some shit. this weeks show may not of been filled with a grip of cool things but i believe this might be the best show i did today. seriously. this week we had the band Automatic Toys on. for some reason when i type "automatic" i want to put a space after "auto" backspace button you are so helpful. i got ripped and fielded a few twitter questions during the inbox. i also even delt with what might have been an attempt to make things better, but im not to sure that did the job. i may be able to get drunk enough to do some seriously "f'd" up stuff but i have limits. time will tell. i know one thing though. things have changed indeed. for the better idk but the show felt very cathartic to say the least. next week will be the true test. this weeks show was fun. i hope you enjoy it as much as i did recording it. enjoy!

item.title: Beneath Everything with Ronnie Rucker - Mountain Tamer
item.description: wow what does someone say when confronted with big breasts and rock and roll music. all i know is im all buzzed thinking about unicorns & pleasurable pain. when in doubt take of your clothes and make a calendar. when you doubt that...head to your favorite podcasts blog and donate money. lots of money. ronnie needs a new pair of shoes. hahahahaha our guest was Mountain Tamer! amazing band outta california. y'all should follow them on twitter & download their Ep The Glad cause its FREE. lots of peeops got on tv with the tweets & i even started getting fresh with peeps...first for everything it appears. podcast is good...really good. you will love it...and if you dont? dont tell anyone cause that would be really penis of you. dont be a penis! be a vagina penis. enjoy!

item.title: Beneath Everything with Ronnie Rucker - Screaming Females
item.description: i swear recording this show is like hot drunken zumba for an hour. as soon as i'm done typing this my a$$ is hitting the shower. another amazing show btw. this week we had new jersey band Screaming Females on. i had an amazing time chatting it up with them. we played a grip of music picked by you. this week we changed it up a bit with the inbox. we took questions from our twitter followers. they came some really good one's like "do you have aids?" hahahahahahaha loved it! talked about our dog that came back to life and much much more. i really think this show is a keeper. take a listen...hope you have as much fun listening as i did recording it. oh yeah i just wanted to thank everyone that mention us on twitter during the recording of this. it was good fun being on tv with y'all!

item.title: Beneath Everything with Ronnie Rucker - Jesse Flores
item.description: wow i cant believe i made it through the whole show. i can't believe im actually doing this post actually. i got really really messed up. i haven't slept for days & the party is still going. this week we had Jesse Flores on the show. she's really cool. i like her alot. i think i could totally hang out with her. oh yeah we did the show a day earlier cause i want to drink beer & pizza during the day tomorrow. its cool being self employed. thank you all for listening. i hope you enjoy the show.... Follow Jesse on Twitter: @jesseflo Check out her website: www.ts-jesse.com Follow Us on Twitter: @beneathradio Playllists & more available on our blog. www.beneatheverything.com
